sentences.sContent: The silver yo-yo that Jerry kept on his office desk was a gimcrack he had won as a carnival prize many years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: The silver yo-yo that Jerry kept on his office desk was a gimcrack he had won as a carnival prize many years ago.
sentences.sCn: 杰里放在他办公桌上的银质溜溜球是他在多年前赢得的狂欢节礼物，一个华而不实的小东西。

words.tran: 虚华不实之物或装饰；（文艺作品中）刻意造成的效果
